name: Jungle Hero
description:
The more delivered, the greater hero of the jungle!

Following the steps, you will be the Jungle Hero: Tilt your device to keep the balance. Pass the bananas to your partner, and always jump across the stones on your way!

Anyway, it is not that easy to get golden coins, as the hated birds are making troubles that you can not avoid! Take this challenge to be a super Jungle Hero!!!

Features of the game:

Challenging gameplay with different level designs
Easy to play but hard to get high scores
Multiple monkey heroes dressing impressively
Pixelate art style with funny details

Your feedback: contact@motigames.com
